Labels are different amog taks but the tasks are related. Note also that the number of class labels is not the same between tasks.  For more info, please don't hesitate to contact me on : jean . faddoul (at) gmail . com , http://www.grappa.univ-lille3.fr/~faddoul/ "             </hdf5:DataFromFile>          </hdf5:Data>       </hdf5:Dataset>       <hdf5:Dataset Name="input" OBJ-XID="xid_6312" H5Path= "/task_descr/input" Parents="xid_1000" H5ParentPaths="/task_descr">          <hdf5:StorageLayout>             <hdf5:ContiguousLayout/>          </hdf5:StorageLayout>                <hdf5:FillValueInfo FillTime="FillIfSet" AllocationTime="Late">             <hdf5:FillValue>                   <hdf5:NoFill/>             </hdf5:FillValue>          </hdf5:FillValueInfo>          <hdf5:Dataspace>             <hdf5:ScalarDataspace />          </hdf5:Dataspace>          <hdf5:DataType>             <hdf5:AtomicType>                <hdf5:StringType Cset="H5T_CSET_ASCII" StrSize="255" StrPad="H5T_STR_NULLPAD"/>             </hdf5:AtomicType>          </hdf5:DataType>          <hdf5:Data>             <hdf5:DataFromFile>             "Two classification tasks, represented by bag-of-words format. Each task in one file. Yahoo! task: https://mldata.org/repository/data/viewslug/yahoo-web-directory-topics/  DMOZ task: https://mldata.org/repository/data/viewslug/dmoz-web-directory-topics/"             </hdf5:DataFromFile>          </hdf5:Data>       </hdf5:Dataset>       <hdf5:Dataset Name="license" OBJ-XID="xid_8448" H5Path= "/task_descr/license" Parents="xid_1000" H5ParentPaths="/task_descr">
